website_summaries.verdict: Popular treatment kit that is endorsed by medical professionals.
pros: Has a pleasant, fresh pear blossom scent
Applicator in this kit is easy to use
Removal kit includes treatment gel, applicator, and comb
cons: Small percentage of users said this product wasn't as effective as they had hoped

customer_reviews.title: Tried the other lice products like 3 times and they kept coming back and I ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had lice, I couldn't believe it , but it happened. Tried the other lice products like 3 times and they kept coming back and I combed her hair every night for hoursssss!!!! Finally I did some research , found this and after the first and second treatment , they have not come back , not weeks or months later Thank God. Buy this, it works and will save you headache and hassle from this little suckers!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Corral

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 y/o daughter's school had a lice issue, which meant that she was repeatedly exposed and they were particularly difficult to get rid of. This kit as invaluable. A word to anyone purchasing this: You MUST follow the directions! Lice are difficult to completely eliminate and you must use both comb devices AND do the second application 10 days later in order to fully rid you or your family's head of those little buggers. This stuff worked and I wouldn't hesitate to purchase it again if there is another exposure to me or anyone in my family.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Riddle

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works!!i have tried other products including prescription lice treatments. This is the only product that got my child lice free. Just make sure to do a second treatment in 10 days (there’s enough for 2 treatments in the bottle) or they’ll be back. It’s a little hard to wash out but just add a little Dawn dishwashing liquid to your shampoo and you’re good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi S

customer_reviews.title: The best product!
customer_reviews.text: Best one yet. I've tried so many solutions and this one works! You put the solution throughout the head and as soon as you use the nit comb, the lice is already dead! Love this!
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: It smells great and comes with a fancy comb to get the ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally something that works!!! We've been dealing with lice for months and have tried everything. I was about to spend $300 on the prescription my doctor gave me, then I saw this kit. It smells great and comes with a fancy comb to get the gel into my daughter's hair. You can see all the dead lice when you do the final step. Yuck. I called the 800 number to thank them, they are a real clinic and now are marketing this magic stuff. Thank God!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste money in this!
customer_reviews.text: This product does not kill lice. All it does is make it easy to comb out lice. Had to purchase a different product after the 2 application of this... it’s expensive and very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Vara2001

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy anything else! This is exactly what you need!
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who has ever been "BLESSED" with these horrid things this is the only product that will not only remove any and all traces, wont damage your hair, smells great and really does the trick. My daughters hair is waist length and thick. I was able to do a full treatment on her, one time and still have enough to do it again if unfortunately needed! I will only ever recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: The Only Thing that’s Worked!!
customer_reviews.text: I was helping a family member get rid of lice that she had for 3 months. We had tried everything! Almost every over the counter lice shampoo from the natural to the chemicals. Her scalp was so damaged from how many treatments she had done. Finally we found this! I got the nit terminator comb too and spent about 2 hours on her hair applying this product and then going through small pieces of her hair over and over until we got all the eggs out. After only one treatment, IT WORKED!!! I highly recommend this to anyone with lice! It’s amazing and we are so thankful for it!
customer_reviews.author: Anni

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Dealing with lice during the Christmas season has been a nightmare! Thank goodness for this Lice Remover Kit since we're finally in the clear! You apply the gel with the special dispenser that's included (see pics) and then comb through with the included lice comb. You do that all again 10 days later and we're lice free! It's tedious but an economical solution!
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: The only brand that worked!
customer_reviews.text: My 1st grade daughter brought home lice from school this year. We tried the only brand in stores in our town, Rexall. While it killed the live bugs, they seemed to keep coming back. I followed the directions exactly, but after a month of treatments, I was frustrated. When searching on Amazon, I came across this green goop. I was skeptical, but it worked! This stuff really coated her hair, it took several days of washing to get her hair back to normal, but we were bug free for 5 weeks before she brought it home again. I immediately ordered this product again and we are hoping it works as well the second time around!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth McBurney

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had lice for months! We tried them all - Rid, Nix, Walmart brand, Walgreens brand, CVS etc. They would kill the lice but kept coming back. Finally decided to try this once. While it did not kill the lice - it did make it a lot easier to remove all the lice and eggs. My daughter has thick long hair - this made it greasy and easier. I hope she doesn’t get them again - but if she does we will buy immediately again. Update - 2 months later. Only used once. Lice have been completely gone. We didn’t even do the follow up. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Finally, something that works!
customer_reviews.text: It works! Seriously!! I have 2 daughters both with hair to their waist and it’s thick! I tried over the counter, everything on Pinterest and prescriptions for 6 months! Nothing worked. THIS STUFF WORKS! It’s has a nice smell and there was enough in one bottle for 2 applications. They hair is greasy after you was it out but after another wash it was fine. I can’t say enough positive things about this product. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Armywife44

customer_reviews.title: Tried it twice to no avail
customer_reviews.text: The application instructions require 2 people although that’s not stated online. Customer service is closed on the weekend. Tried the product twice in a row (meaning 4 total applications since the product requires 2 applications per bottle within 10 days)
customer_reviews.author: Isis is a goddess.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: I had used the Nix and it did not work. My kids brought the lice from daycare and they were infested by the time we noticed. I got this and I ONLY used it ONCE and my oldest is lice free. My youngest is almost done. We even had got the lice from our kids and with one try we are clean. Now im getting the preventative shampoo! Love the smell better than our regular shampoos. Easy to use and better than any other product.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried CVS brand lice shampoo, did not work. I tried Nix brand, did not work. Even tried coconut oil and that didn’t work either. All of those left live lice still in my daughters hair. This product was a miracle and WORKED. It leaves the hair greasy for awhile even after washing but its worth it to be rid of the lice!! Paired this with the Terminator lice comb and problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea King

customer_reviews.title: Made my lice mad!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hi. I bought this kit. I followed directions to the letter. Combed the shampoo out thoroughly .It seemed to stun the active lice for a few hours and when they woke up they were mad!!!! I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ewkilgore

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: We been fighting these things for months. I every i could use from Walmart, cvs, you name it we used it. I was so sick of my daughter having lice. Every other day I would go thru her hair and didn't see eggs but boom back again. So I Google searched and this product popped up. Just in one treatment it was taking twice the amount of nit that the other stuff did remove from a week ago. It was crazy the amount of nit were in her hair still and found more lice using this product. I hope this ends the madness. But so far so good. I'm pleased
customer_reviews.author: monnaie price

customer_reviews.title: I won't use any other product for reason needed!
customer_reviews.text: Only issue & reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is b/c the bottle top was broken when I removed the gel from box. Otherwise this seemed to work quite nicely & was used as a precaution for a follow up purchase from an actual Lice Clinics of America that I took my daughter to for the full service treatment. Would highly recommend going to an actual clinic if one could afford to.
customer_reviews.author: Trthskr

customer_reviews.title: Applicator missing
customer_reviews.text: I had a missing applicator, so I was forced to dump it on my head, which made for a very gloppy mess. Unlike the reviews, it took more than one treatment for the nits to be gone. I was really hoping that I would only need to use it once. BUT, I will say that it smells really nice and it only takes about two shampoos to rinse out. It also seems to be much more effective than what I got at the store. For that reason, I'm ordering again and hoping I won't need a third treatment--and hoping I get an applicator this time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE, DOESN’T WORK AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: This did not work at all, followed the directions exactly, still those little vampires! Did it again 10 days later, did nothing. Would absolutely not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pam S

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Didnt kill any of the lice. I spent hours using this exactly how the instructions directed and would have been better off just running a lice comb through it. We even put some in a bowl to see how long it would take to kill crawling lice and it didn't kill anything. I would put zero stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Hooligans

customer_reviews.title: ... is the only thing that has worked for my great niece Bella who has been infested for awhile
customer_reviews.text: I is the only thing that has worked for my great niece Bella who has been infested for awhile. It smells great and killed all the lice, it didn't remove all the nits but we are working on the comb out which is the only way to totally get clean,
customer_reviews.author: deanna ireland

customer_reviews.title: did not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This did not work on superlice. It slowed them down a bit, no lice for about 18 hours, then, slowly, there they they were again... slowly at first, and within 2 days, theyre baaaaack. and yes, all clothing, all bedding, everything, washed and dried daily. still, these super lice can not be killed. I am about to try turpentine....? This here expensive shampoo would probably have to be used Every Day to get an actual full on "cure".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer33333

customer_reviews.title: Do research and follow directions
customer_reviews.text: Finally a product that worked amazing! My daughter got lice from school and we used the products at the drugstore and they didn’t work! I did some research, read reviews, followed the directions and did the follow up treatment, I now can say we are lice free! FINALLY! My daughter has the thickest hair ever and I didn’t even use the entire bottle. Took the time and went through her hair and got all the nits out. Hours and hours of going through her hair and this product helped so much. I bought an extra box just in case she gets it again. Does make your hair oily but washed two times and it came out.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Used Product
customer_reviews.text: It was used, opened, the brush had eggs on it, disgusting. I did not send it back because I hate returning, but I should of have. I went ahead and put the rest of the product on my daughter and it was gross, it was like a sticky gel, I put it on her two weeks ago and the product does not want to come off completely it leaves a sticky residues that wont come off. Would not recommend, they need to have a quality check before they send the product to customers.
customer_reviews.author: Dafne

customer_reviews.title: i can't believe it
customer_reviews.text: honestly could cry. we've been trying for an embarrassingly long time to get my daughter's lice under control - heat treatments, constant combing, chemical kits, "natural" kits, listerine, mayo, shower caps, literally anything anyone told us to do. bought this and they were gone first treatment. i did a second treatment just to be sure, but i dont think she needed it. i cannot believe it. i dont know whats in this product, but it FINALLY did what we needed it to do. smell is awesome, btw. product is thick and greasy and needs several rinses to get out fully. but honestly thats a worthy trade off.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa N Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had a tough case of lice. We had already been through a treatment with another product and the lice didn't go away. That's when I found the lice remover kit and gave it a go. Not only did the product work but the emails I received from the company on how they are there to help was so reassuring. Last night I got a follow up email reminding me that it had been 9 days and it was time to do her second treatment! We had actually just finished the treatment with total success .. no lice found! So if you're having a hard time with lice, please try this product.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hutson

customer_reviews.title: Works the best
customer_reviews.text: This works better than anything we bought over the counter. Forget all the rest BUY THIS ONE FIRST. Save your self lots of time, money and frustration. Lice are the worst since you have to take apart your whole house and repeat the process over and over. But this will kill them right from the start. Everything you need is in the one box. I bought an extra to have on hand if we ever have another infestation!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! we had been battling a reoccurring case of lice in my children for almost 2 months. We kept using over the counter stuff from Walgreens and it just was not cutting it. I finally decided to give this a try and it worked with one application. the comb it came with makes it super easy to apply and didn't burn the scalp the way the other shampoo did. I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Rivera

customer_reviews.title: It works! (Yes, it’s sticky that’s why it works)
customer_reviews.text: Finally! A product that actually works! We made it 11 years without my thick haired daughter bringing home these disgusting creatures...and then it happened. We tried the over the counter shampoos and conditioners, but every time I’d retreat I’d find another few nits. This is the only thing that worked well with her thick hair. The gel is extremely sticky, it’s definitely not the easiest thing to use, and we had to wash with dawn to get the residue out, but it was worth it 100%!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with this treatment
customer_reviews.text: This was my first lice experience with my child. A friend gave me this product and it worked great!! I’m 100% satisfied! My daughter has EXTREMELY thick, curly hair! I did have to use a second bottle for the second application, because of the amount of hair. But it worked great. I couldn’t find it at the stores locally to me, so I bought two more kits online to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Rinaldo

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to use! It has a very nice unlike store brands that smell like weird chemicals. My daughter had hair down halfway to her back and this product had enough to do the initial and 2nd application. Her lice were completely gone. She just started school again so I know I will need to rebuy this product. Please try this before buying any other brands. The only downside is that it left her hair a little only even after I shampooed the gel out but by the second time I showered her the excess oil was gone.
customer_reviews.author: Elvia

customer_reviews.title: Did not work on me...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have bought this...the first time it worked fine for my daughter, but it did not work on me. Very frustrated that I spent so much, only to continue to deal with this. Tried to get refund, but they want me to ship the used one back? Not really possible as I used it, but just didn't work. Would change to a much higher rating if their "money back guarantee" was an actual thing, or if I could get another bottle sent to me to see if it would work. :(
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Watson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: It’s all natural. It kills lice and is amazing at getting out the nit eggs. Way better than the over the counter stuff. I have 2 long haired girls. It was so easy to apply by combing in. After applying you let it set for 10 min. The gel also detangles the hair which makes it easier to comb through. Then you comb through with the lice pick. The metal comb is awesome. I swear it gets everything. But do the second treatment regardless. This made the lice infestation in my house much easier to deal with. If we happen to get lice again I will be using this again!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Titsworth

customer_reviews.title: Finally, something that WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: After trying 5-6 different methods and otc products...we took a gamble on this somewhat expensive method. And we are SOOO thankful we did. It was worth every penny, and we had already spent hundreds on ALL the products we tried and didn't work. The application is simply, goes on easy, the process is quick and easy to follow and 10 days I truly believe is the magic number. All the other methods say 7...but 10 makes way more scientific sense. A little oily to wash out, but a couple shampoos and the hair was all clean. Thank you for this amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: CRW

customer_reviews.title: It works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instruction and applied the product twice with a 10-day gap in between. In the second application, quite a few dead eggs were still combed out. Don't panic. The lice problem was resolved indeed. P.S., perhaps a key to this success is that I cut my daughter's long hair to shoulder length before applying this product - my kid was reluctant but has loved the short-hair style ever since.
customer_reviews.author: another solution

customer_reviews.title: If you want to make sure you get rid of head lice, buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lice treatment available. I had tried everything else there is to get rid of my daughter's headlice, and this was the only thing that worked, and it worked right away. It smells really good and is easy to use. I recommend this to all of my friends and keep a bottle on hand for those just in case moments.
customer_reviews.author: Tawnya Brown

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Not effective. Followed directions to the letter. Separated hair and combed for over an hour. Redid treatment exactly 10 days later. Treated the house and linens. Got a call a week after the 2nd treatment from the school to pick my child up again.
customer_reviews.author: legggos137

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever ..Lice be gone!
customer_reviews.text: Best product ever! We finally got rid of the lice! Lice start dying right away. Love the scent Does not leave residue I'm beyond happy (: Very easy to apply I even got an email reminder from vendor to apply the lice treatment at 10 days. My kids are happier and can sleep better at night.
customer_reviews.author: CarmenS

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend just buying this before anything else!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm! Our neighbor kid had lice for over a month and parents told them not to tell anyone well that ended up infesting 1/2 the school buss I bought 2 kits for my girls and had most of the second kit still so I offered it to my neighbor & told other parents how well it worked with no bad smell or burning like most other treatments. so far no more outbreaks!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product that worked for my daughter (who has very long hair) after multiple failures with drug store brands and also trying the conditioner with tea tree oil added method. I do think she had “super lice”, we just could not get rid of them until we used this product. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina E

customer_reviews.title: Best product on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best! Works better than any other brand I have tried in the past. Does leave your hair greasy looking and takes a few shampoos to get it back to normal non greasy but beats the alternative. We just did it in the weekend and washed hair 2 nights in a row and perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I havnt had a chance to use it yet thank god....there was a letter from school that lace was going around so just to be prepared I ordered this one I like how it has everything very good packaged and looks decent if I ever used it I will. Update my review of and when I purchased it it send me a reminder 10 days from first use as they counted so very good
customer_reviews.author: Nila Ibrahimi

customer_reviews.title: The only lice treatment you’ll ever need
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got lice and we tried every product out there from chemical, to natural, to calling the doctor for a prescription. This is the first product that actually worked and didn’t make my eyes burn. It comes with everything you need. I would highly recommend and will never buy another kind of treatment ever again
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!
customer_reviews.text: I'd tried several off the shelf items to remove my daughters' lice with no luck. This was the only thing that actually worked!! Add the great thing is it's only 2 treatments spread 10 days apart and not every single night like the other stuff. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: suzy wiliams

customer_reviews.title: messy and ineffective
customer_reviews.text: I found this product pretty useless and a waste of money. It was really hard to use on long hair; perhaps on boys with short hair it would be a little easier. It had an unpleasant smell, and the contraption you put on top of the bottle was difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing applicator
customer_reviews.text: I would love to say this product is great but honestly I wouldn't know if it was or not it did not come with the No Mess applicator so I have to figure out how I'm going to use this product on my daughter and hope that I don't get it in her eyes
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Salwasser

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye unwanted visitors!!
customer_reviews.text: We've had visitors for almost 5 months. I've tried all the OTC stuff following the directions, but while combing through afterwards, they're still CRAWLING around alive. Ugh. Gave this a try and took so much pleasure combing out dead guys. I've bought 2 refills to keep in stock since it was such a simple system to use.
customer_reviews.author: Corry Jankowski

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This product does everything it needs to do it kills living lice it takes eggs out easily this product works very very good I have been battling lice for a long time and my daughter also got lice nothing worked for us we sat through a 7 hour cleaning session tried Wal-Mart shampoos and combs tried pet combs and nothing I thought to try this product and it worked instantly I dont know how to thank them enough and the price is not expensive me and my daughter got rid of all of it and yes including the eggs in 4 hours I have really thick hair and it worked great I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Alliyah

customer_reviews.title: It really works !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We tried multiple products and none of them worked on the stubborn lice.But this one was able to help after TWO applications. My daughter is 100% lice free and happy now and so am i. I would definitely recommend trying this product. We are completely satisfied. Tip: After applying the gel we left it little longer than recommended time. We also spent extra time to get rid of the lice by combing them out before washing the hair. Ran the comb through hot water to get rid of the lice stuck to the comb.
customer_reviews.author: satbala1

customer_reviews.title: it works!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Went through 2 lice on my daughter with very long hair. Was getting ready to do a big chop on her hair but I found this. This kit is amazing. My daughter has dirty blonde hair and I was amazed how this was pulling lice from her hair that I couldn't even see. Will be buying another kit to do her hair again in a week as suggested
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited to get this product since it is from Lice Center of America, but it DID NOT Work. We did exactly what the instructions said and still had lice. At that point had to call the Dr to prescribe something to fully get rid of it. The Smell of the product was great and left my daughters hair very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Slone

customer_reviews.title: PREVENTION KIT
customer_reviews.text: WE BUY 1 EVERY 2 MONTHS AS JUST A PREVENTION KIT FOR MY DAUGHTER BECAUSE LICE IS BAD AT SCHOOL AND I JUST FEEL ITS BETTER TO BE SAFE THAN SORRY. ALTHOUGH SHES NEVER HAD IT, IT SEEMS TO KEEP THEM AT BAY BECAUSE ALOT OF KIDS IN HER CLASS CAUGHT IT AND IT NEVER EVEN BOTHERED HER.
customer_reviews.author: jamie swaffar

customer_reviews.title: It's hard at first but once you got the handle of it. It'll be easy.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried numerous products. Was going crazy because nothing was working. Until I decided to try this. This is a miracle worker. My daughter was so full dead of lice. All over her hair. This made it sooooo easy to take them out. Now I am recommending to my sister because she's at deep ends. I just wish they a product to keep them away for good. Thank you soooo much.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena L.

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: we had been battling serious case of head lice for months..it seemed like every time i thought it was gone..boom it was back....with one treatment with this product we have not had any more issues for 6 months now..thank gawd!!! i love how it coats the hair and leaves it smooth and easy to comb through..my daughter has think long hair and the other products turned it in to knots and it was such a hassle......crossing my fingers we will avoid any more lice situations...but if we do this will be the only product we use!!
customer_reviews.author: kgardner540

customer_reviews.title: Works effectively if you have the patience for it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 6 months ago thinking it would come in handy for my son who’s in middle school. Well , guess what? He must have come in contact with some kids who have lice at his school because he definitely got them ! Anyways, the product works great . However we did search and cleaned his head a day before using the product , so we used Lice treatment the following day and did a second Cleaning. The comb works great as it grabs a lot of the bits and adult lice. He’s clean for now . We’ll check in a week again to see if we missed to remove any.
customer_reviews.author: Katerine U

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST TREATMENT OUT THERE
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I don’t usually write reviews, but let me tell you!! This product is AMAZING! My nieces have been struggling with SUPER lice for years! And one use of this and the nit terminator *POOF* they’re gone!! I really recommend this product to whoever wants the job done! I’ve tried RID, Doctor prescriptions, and nothing! This really works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truly amazing plesse read!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Should have got this 6 years ago and countless 1000 dollor I mean 1000 of dollor. My god I never thought the lice would go away. Dont try anything else. I dony work for this company and I'm not being paid for this. But this product is a life saver. My kids are finely happy confident not Embarrassed that they had lice they are truly happy and so am I
customer_reviews.author: Mr Roberts

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this junk. I followed all the instructions and it didn’t even kill the bugs and the comb did not remove the bugs. Waste of time and money and it’s so MESSY!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: works great easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to use and apply. Works great its like a thick soapy gel, did not seem to hurt my 3 year old when washing off.smells like green apples. Did leave my daughters hair a little oily after. Was able to do 4 treatments
customer_reviews.author: mlucia

customer_reviews.title: What's good and helps and what don't.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a child or grandchild living with you this is the perfect thing to order and it works amazing. I've tried a lot of lice products before and I'm telling you this is the one THANK YOU AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: April Russell

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful don't waste your time with anything else this works and works quick. This first time I got head lice, I was blessed to have it recently as an adult. I spray my hair with a hose, washed it a million times, used the good ole mayonnaise trick but this was the best out of all the methods.
customer_reviews.author: Cora Blackburn

customer_reviews.text: i am giving this 3 stars! only because ti was fast shipping and because it came in great condition but overall I have only used it once and it hasnt really worked! i ended up using teat tree oil and running the comb thru my daughters hair I got more results doing that!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Cano

customer_reviews.title: I bought 4 bottles and used them all, I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 bottles and used them all, I bought the titan comb and combed through my children's hair. Two days later they still had lice. This product did not work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Marlana

customer_reviews.title: This really works!! The cure to your lice problem!
customer_reviews.text: Omg this stuff really works! I have been trying for months to get rid of these lice. My little sister came home from school one day with lice and she passed it on to my mom and myself. All 3 of us used this product and now all 3 are finally lice free. The product smelled really good and came in a nice package. There is a video on YouTube that we followed on how to apply it properly. We did use it a second time (7 days later) to efficiently kill the eggs that were left. I 100% recommend to anyone looking for a lice solution.
customer_reviews.author: Johana

customer_reviews.title: Very quick and easy to use with no mess
customer_reviews.text: Very quick and easy to use with no mess. The application comb was a lifesaver for my girls who have thick curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Tomky

customer_reviews.title: Does not kill the lice
customer_reviews.text: This product does not kill the lice. I had to purchase another brand at a store it worked better than this on RID works good
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Rayas

customer_reviews.title: This stuff actually kills them! Smells good too
customer_reviews.text: It actually killed the bugs. The other stuff at the store would be still alive. The thing is the eggs I couldn't get them all out so they r back again! I am so sick of these annoying bugs. Like they moved in and I gave them an eviction notice and they won't leave. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Lanai murray

customer_reviews.title: Combing out nits was a BREEZE!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter brought home lice from a "tea party". The easy to use applicator was perfect for our thick hair! the product applied quickly and evenly throughout the layers of hair. I am not certain of the effectiveness of actually killing the lice or eggs, but the consistency of the product made combing so easy, quick and effective!! The product definitely ate through the "glue" that keeps lice stuck to the hair. It was a tad bit runny which lead to dripping. a towel around the shoulders and on the floor was a quick solution for mess-free.
customer_reviews.author: Danii Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Totally works!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has really curly hair and this was a breeze and didn’t dry out her hair like everything else we’ve tried in the past and it works. Only thing is cause her hair was so thick we had to wash her hair twice to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We had been dealing with lice for months. Yes. Months! After the first treatment with this I saw no lice. I did the second application as recommended. I haven’t had a problem in over 4 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The gel is amazing and smelled
customer_reviews.text: This kit really did the job. My daughter has had lice several times.I wish I had known about this product sooner. She had long thick curly hair and we were able to get the treatment done in a few hours. Other kits took us all day. The gel is amazing and smelled great
customer_reviews.author: Shelli

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My niece had used couple of times. She reported complete recovery from Lice. Earlier, she tried different products with no major improvement. So, I will strongly recommend this product. One negative point: The bottle size to small. If you have big hair, the you can't use it more than 3/4 times.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Saber

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was the only thing that worked to remove lice from my child’s head. I live in Texas and from my understanding we have “super lice” which is ridiculous to get rid of. The only downfall for this is that it does leave the kids hair oily a day or 2.
customer_reviews.author: AKChan

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old got dry skin all over the body due to this
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this product at all. It says "non toxic", but it caused a huge allergy reaction for my 3 year old and she has been suffering through extremely dry skin since past three weeks. I have no cure for her now as she is suffering with eczema due to this!!! It's horrible that people even sell products like this.
customer_reviews.author: Pratik

customer_reviews.title: I combed out live lice
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s time to get real parents. Although the reviews on this product are rave, 99% of them start with “I was at my wits end..” “on my third product..” “5th time around the lice track...” at the end of the day NOTHING WORKS the first time. This product makes us feel better without pesticides, smells lovely, and is fairly easy to use. I combed out living lice with it so not sure how so many people claim this product kills the little buggers. All I’m saying is prepare to deal with lice over and over and over regardless of what product you use. Buckle up, it’s a long road ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Kar

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I had given my daughter multiple treatments of various lice shampoos and nothing seemed to work. She has very thick hair and it seemed like we were never going to get rid of the lice. I finally broke down & bought this kit. It killed everything after 2 treatments. I highly recommend the kit, and to be on the safe side get the refill bottle. If you child is like mine (too friendly and a big hugger) you will need it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product/ not as harsh as others
customer_reviews.text: My son came home from school with lice, we ordered this through same day delivery and he was able to go back to school the next day. It’s the full kit- everything you need - although the comb ripped my kiddos hair out so we mainly used the comb on the applicator, which worked great. The product didn’t seem toxic, it had a mild scent and altogether it took a few washes, it left the hair clean and lice free.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Foe

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really, really works!
customer_reviews.text: I have to stress that the Lice Clinics of America products kit is the only lice removal kit that worked for my daughter. She goes to a public elementary school with 28+ students. So getting lice is more common than you think. I initially used Nix and another name brand lice removal kit. I had to use another box and struggle with removing the lice for weeks and weeks. With Lice Clinics of America products, I used ONE box and the lice was gone! Buy this product, you will not be sorry! Pro Tip: Follow the instructions and skip any steps. I took my time and was successful in removing all of the lice with one box and one treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Buy it! Don’t hesitate! My daughter got lice we did the normal treatment and picked nits out for a week. Then when my other daughter a very curly, tender headed girl got lice I had this on hand. Let me tell you I’ve never used anything that got it so good the first time! And to remove nits also is amazing! Now it doesn’t get ALL of the nits but I checked her hair next day only found 10! And it was easy to treat myself as a just in case since no one else checks mamas hair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The meds don’t kill the bugs.
customer_reviews.text: I like the scent the comb was really good but the actual meds didn’t kill the bugs the bugs were still alive so I don’t know what the meds were suppose to do the comb got them out really good but I was just disappointed that the meds didn’t kill them and I feel like for the price it should of.
customer_reviews.author: Carrina a

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have four daughters in elementary and couldn’t get rid of lice issues. This product is absolutely amazing! Easy to use, no sharp smell or fumes, no complicated directions. You just need to wash it very well since it’s oil based.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: I only trust this brand
customer_reviews.text: Love this company and the products. They work great. Solves my daughter's lice issue.
customer_reviews.author: angelmom

customer_reviews.title: Super Greasey
customer_reviews.text: This product smells really good. Not sure if it has worked or not on my daughter's hair. It's really thick like honey consistency. Its leaves the hair really greasy and is almost impossible to get rid of the greasey feel and look of the hair. Be prepared with a good clarifying shampoo after using this lice treatment. I shampooed my daughters hair 3 times with clarifying shampoo after using this treatment and its still super greasy that is the only down fall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: We had several bouts with head lice.during this school year, and had tried everything from home remedies to nix, this is the only thing that took care of it. Easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Mack

customer_reviews.title: It works like charm
customer_reviews.text: I am not the type of person that leaves reviews but for this I have to. I am telling you, this product works! After trying all the products in the stores non of them worked but this did. I am so happy I found this product. Parents...if you have been struggling with lice like I have with my daughter for over a yr...I suggest you give this a try..You will LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Did not include applicator as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This product is extremely oily. If you use it, be prepared to wash your hair multiple times to get the oil out of your hair. Also we got some on the floor and it made the floors slippery. The applicator was not included as advertised, which was a major let down and made for applying to be extremely messy. We used it once and the lice returned so I would follow the directions and repeat the treatment as directed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product followed instructions in kit and they also sent email with instructions and a number to call with questions. Worked fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The kit is great! The shampoo doesn't have a horrible smell like most, and it was easy to use. It only takes 10 minutes for the gel to set, and start killing those nasty bugs! It saved us so much time, and many tears!!! Only thing I didn't care for was the packaging.. by the time it got to my house, the bottle of gel had busted, and about half of the bottle had leaked all over the box, and bag it was shipped in.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Works on super lice!
customer_reviews.text: So I tried everything from diy treatments to store bought treatments to prescription treatments. After a month my kids still had those pesky little things. I bought two of these because I have 3 kids and it says to repeat at 10 days. One box worked on the first treatment for all three girls and at ten days they were lice free still! I highly recommend especially if you have tried other treatments!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This lice treatment is awesome and really worked on my daughter hair ,Now my daughter is lice free the smell is good ,and love the fact that this treatment is a little greasy and it helped with the nits
customer_reviews.author: Angelito Lazarini

customer_reviews.title: Works well but must scour the environment or your washing/lice treatment will be for naught
customer_reviews.text: Does the trick . Good to precede with Epsom salt bath -->dry-->vinegar soak -->lice remover treatment -->comb --> wash with limonene shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Issue not resolved
customer_reviews.text: This was used for head lice and they are still present. Directions followed to the T. Not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: It works !
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my 3rd year old and best believe this one actually works !! Right away too . I use it once a week just to make sure those lice dont return so far we have 1 month of lice free !
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: It worked.
customer_reviews.text: I did two treatments, like it suggests. I have really long hair (down to my boobs), so I actually had to purchase 2 separate kits to cover everything. But it got rid of the lice after the first try, I'm just a crazy person and wanted to EXTRA eradicate them. Look no further - this treatment really works.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, amazing, amazing! I wish I would have found this product 4 months ago!! I've been dealing with an infestation for 4 months now. I used all the products out there, also mayonnaise, and vinegar. And nothing worked. Until I used this and now they're all gone. I recommended it to my friend who is dealing with the same problem and she's so grateful. I will continue to recommend it to anyone who is dealing with lice.
customer_reviews.author: Roxana carazo

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product it killed lice instantly on contact, but I'm still having issues with lice very frustrating! As it guarantees to kill super lice, my daughter isn't infested so I figured this would make it go away the first time. I subscribed to a subscription of this product. I will keep using to see if it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really taught I was never going to be able to resolve the issue. My daughter Had lice for over a month. This killed everything! The Brush is very stiff and very good quality. My daughter love the smell. Thank you. Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.author: azucena esteban

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Not so easy to apply and has very little product. It says that you have to use it multiple times for it to work but w the amount of product it contains it doesn’t even have enough for one use
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Lice Killing Machine
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely FANTASTIC. Helped kill all of the lice and cost a fraction of the prescription brand! Literally a LIFESAVER and so easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Jade Hassan

product_meta.title: Lice Treatment Kit by Lice Clinics-Guaranteed to Cure Lice, Even Super Lice-Safe, Non-Toxic, Pesticide-Free (Complete Head Lice Treatment & Lice Removal Kit with Lice Shampoo, Metal Lice Comb & More)
feature_bullets: LICE FREE LICE TREATMENT GUARANTEE — We guarantee your satisfaction or your money back! Please contact Lice Clinics of America with any questions or concerns - or if we can help! We care that your head lice treatment is successful and your family is lice free.
EFFECTIVE AGAINST LICE & SUPER LICE – The included liquid gel kills lice AND super lice, and it’s more effective than traditional pesticide-based head lice shampoo treatments.
PESTICIDE-FREE, NON-TOXIC FORMULA — Our liquid gel is harsh on head lice, yet doesn't contain any harmful chemicals or pesticides, so it’s a safe & effective lice treatment for kids & adults.
COMPLETE KIT — Includes everything needed for effective head lice treatment and lice removal: easy-to-use no-mess applicator, 5.25 oz. liquid gel, and premium metal head lice comb.
PLEASANT SCENT — The included liquid gel has a great fresh pear blossom scent that mom and kids will love.
